<p><a href="http://learnlayout.com/flexbox.html" rel="noreferrer">Use FlexBox CSS</a></p>

<p>Flexbox is a perfect fit for this type of problem. While mostly known for laying out content in the horizontal direction, Flexbox actually works just as well for vertical layout problems. All you have to do is wrap the vertical sections in a flex container and choose which ones you want to expand. Theyll automatically take up all the available space in their container.</p>
